answers.answer: Since diabetes runs in all of your family the diabetes gene variant leads to a sizable risk that you may have inherited it. Your thirst symptoms mimic diabetes but could be 100 other causes too. Get a thorough health checkup that includes testing for diabetes.
A test would be a good thing for you. They told me genetics was a factor.

question: I was just wondering whether  it is worth me getting tested for diabetes.For a couple of months now i have been drinking up to 3 litres a day and wake up during the night with huge thirsts, i havn't lost weight or anything like that but all of my family on my dads side apart from my dad has quite bad diabetes. It could just be me being paranoid just wondering what people on here think.
title: should i get tested
